content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Emilia Müller from Germany. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in München. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Emilia Müller from Germany

content: Greetings, Emilia Müller. While I appreciate your interest in the apartment, let us focus solely on discussing the rental price for now. To begin negotiations, I propose a price of 1500 Euro per month.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: That is a bit high for me. How about we meet in the middle at 1200 Euro?
name: Emilia Müller from Germany

content: I don't want to continue the negotiation, because lowering the price significantly reduces my potential earnings.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Okay, I will make a compromise. I offer you 1300 Euro.
name: Emilia Müller from Germany

content:
I agree to the price of 1300 Euro!
TERMINATE
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany
